long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the Ultimate Search Extension!

Transform the way you search the web with our innovative extension that consolidates access to countless websites into a single, user-friendly interface.

Key Features:

- Unified Search Box: Search any website directly from one convenient search box, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple tabs or bookmarks.

- Extensive Search Engine Library: With thousands of pre-configured search engines, you can easily find information across various platforms. Plus, you have the flexibility to add your own custom search engines.

- Versatile Search Options: Whether you're looking for information, videos, images, translations, maps, shopping deals, or currency conversions, our extension has you covered.

- Local Search Capabilities: Effortlessly search for local businesses and services in your area, making it easier to find what you need without the hassle.

- Privacy Focused: Your searches remain private and secure, as they do not leave your browser. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your data is protected.

- Convenient Shortcuts: Utilize keyboard shortcuts for quick access and enhanced functionality, including options for opening results in new tabs or windows.

- Seamless Experience: Say goodbye to Google's "Redirect Notice" page when using the "I'm feeling lucky" feature, ensuring a smoother and faster browsing experience.

Why Choose Our Extension?

If you're tired of the limitations of traditional search methods and want a more efficient way to access information online, this extension is designed for you. It streamlines your search process, enhances your privacy, and provides a customizable experience tailored to your needs.
